summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image depicts a dark, rocky cavern environment from a video game. There are two large, white, textured objects resembling eggs or rocks in the foreground. The cavern is dimly lit, with shadows cast by the surrounding rock formations. A series of similar white objects are scattered across the landscape, leading up to a higher platform in the background. Two red arrows are overlaid on the image, pointing towards different paths or directions within the cavern. A character wearing a cloak is visible walking towards the right side of the image, suggesting a possible route or objective.
